QuestData.Title: We Need Each Other
QuestData.Description: My father believes he is indulging me. He has ruled for two hundred years, many lifetimes of trolls. In his mind, de threats dat face our kingdom are minor.$b$bI have seen too much to believe dat.$b$bSo since my father and his advisors would not help, I turned to someone who would.$b$bYour warchief needs our fleet, and I need her champions. So here is what we need to do.
